args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Incorrect Horn Pad May Prevent Horn From Sounding

Tesla, Inc. (Tesla) is recalling certain 2021-2024 Model S and 2021-2025 Model X vehicles.  An air bag with the incorrect horn pad may have been installed, preventing the horn from sounding.An inoperative horn may prevent the driver from alerting other drivers, increasing the risk of a collision.

Number of Units Affected: 91.0
